scripts.start-dev: npm run build-dev && npx webpack serve --env mode=development
scripts.start-prod: npm run build-prod && npx webpack serve --env mode=production
scripts.gh-deploy: npm run build-prod && git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix prod-build origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-deploy-init: npm run build-prod && git push origin && git subtree push --prefix prod-build origin gh-pages
